directions: In a large pot over high heat, combine the bouillon, carrots, tomatoes, onion, celery, green bell pepper, cabbage, basil, garlic, Italian-style seasoning and water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 to 45 minutes, or until all vegetables are to desired tenderness.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with juice
1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil or to taste
title: Slim Soup
